name: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Demo Version (Web Build)
name_original: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Demo Version (Web Build)
description:
Click/Tap on the game display before playing, and make sure you're using English language for the input.

Control 

  • W - Up
  • S - Down
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • J - A
  • K - B
  • Ctrl - Select
  • Enter - Start

Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Demo Version Web Build allows you to play this game direcly on itch.io!

The Demo version of Gameboy fangame for Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun (A.K.A. Jibaku Shounen Hanako-Kun) manga/anime.

If you found bugs, problems or suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

Original manga/anime by Aidairo 

Game by Hannor Smith
